General.Name: Megachem (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Megachem (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of specialty chemicals in Thailand. The company distributes a range of chemical products that are used in various applications, such as adhesive, cleaning, construction, cosmetics, lubricants, paint, brake pad, oil and gas, paper, food and beverage, polyurethane, ink, polymerization, plastic, pharmaceutical, textile, rubber, metal finishing, water treatment, and electronics. It also imports and distributes construction materials, ethanol chemicals, and hospital and agricultural equipment. Megachem (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
